title: PBE bug

embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

body:
Hey all,
So I want to create a PBE account. I click on the "PBE: Become a tester" tab in the top right-hand corner, and the page loads for about 2 minutes and then gives me an error 500. Why is this? Is there a way I can create an account for PBE? This issue has been going on for a while, so Riot, take a look at it, please.
Thanks!
Tyler3wannabe

replies.body:
Error 500 on this page usually indicates there's an issue with your pathing to the page. You may be able to resolve this by [**clearing your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), logging into your account from the [**NA Landing Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/), then visiting the [**NA PBE Signup page**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

It doesn't, the link is from two years ago and no longer properly registers.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
